activation-mode.name: Activation Mode
activation-mode.description:
Defines when to activate Battle Mode, aka, all the mod's features. 

- 'On Start' will activate the mod as soon as the level starts.
- 'Mid-Game Keybind' will let you activate the mod at any time using a keybind (default: Q).

party-char1.name: Party - Character 1
party-char1.description: The character to use in the Deltarune styled tab. Affects max HP value. If the current level is a demon, max HP gets a +40 bonus (putting the delta warriors in their Ch4 health values).

party-char2.name: Party - Character 2
party-char2.description: Same as before, but defines your second party member.

party-char3.name: Party - Character 3
party-char3.description: Same as before, but defines your third party member.

enable-soul.name: Soul Mode
enable-soul.description: Replaces the player icon with the soul.

ui-scale.name: UI Scale - Party UI
ui-scale.description: Controls the scale of the Party Members UI elements at the bottom of the screen.

always-imitate-deltarune-pos.name: Damage/Down/Heal indicators - Always Immitate Deltarune Position
always-imitate-deltarune-pos.description: Always positions the damage, downed and healing indicators to the left side of the screen, like on Deltarune's battle screen, instead of trying to fetch the Player's screen pos.
